Text: Whoever ripped this, did a lousy job taking care of proportions. Unless you are interested in seeing porno squeezed from the top and stretched sidewise, download something else.
Thanks for the warning. BTW,  Media Player Classic will let you scale the vid any way you want. Nice for these kind of off-scale vids. Just stretch it the other way to make it right...
Bolivar Shagnasty: Great tip, it works just fine! I really don't know why that excellent player was hidden somewhere in the dark corners of my discs...
